post.description: Creates a new bookmark and returns a confirmation message

github_id.description: GitHub ID of the user creating the bookmark

resource_id.description: ID of the resource being bookmarked by the user

delete.description: Deletes a bookmark and returns a confirmation message

get.summary: Get all bookmarks for a student
get.description: If the student's github_id exists it returns all bookmarks for that student or an empty array in case there is not any

post.description: Creates a new like and returns a confirmation message

delete.description: Deletes a like and returns a confirmation message

get.summary: Get all likes for a student
get.description: If the student's github_id exists it returns all likes for that student or an empty array in case there is not any

put.description: Allows an authorized user to update the role of a specific GitHub ID.

github_id.description: GitHub ID of the user to assign the role

authorized_github_id.description: GitHub ID of the user making the request (must have permissions)

403.description: Unauthorized: Cannot update a role of user of equal or higher role rank or make an update to an equal or higher rank than your own

message.example: No puedes actualizar un rol que ya es de orden igual o superior al tuyo.
La petición contiene un rol inexistente.

post.description: Allows an authorized user to create a new role for a specific GitHub ID.

github_id.description: GitHub ID of the user to assign the role

authorized_github_id.description: GitHub ID of the user making the request (must have permissions)

403.description: Unauthorized: Cannot create a role equal or higher than your own

message.example: No puedes crear un rol igual o superior al tuyo.
La petición contiene un rol inexistente.

post.summary: Retrieve a role by GitHub ID
post.description: Fetches a role using the provided GitHub ID. If the role does not exist, it returns an error.

put.description: Updates a role using the provided GitHub ID. If the role does not exist, it returns an error.

403.description: Unauthorized: The feature flag for role self-assignment is disabled

message.example: La autoasignación de roles ha sido desactivada.
La petición contiene un github_id inexistente en nuestro sistema.

get.description: Returns a list of all resources

post.summary: Create a new resource (deprecated, use /api/v2/resources instead)
post.description:
This endpoint is deprecated and will be removed soon. Please use the new endpoint /api/v2/resources instead.
     *      Creates a new resource and returns the created resource

github_id.description: GitHub ID of an existing user role creating the resource

description.example: A collection of best practices for Laravel development

tags.description: Array of tags validated against available options (nullable)

title: The title field is required.
Title must be at least 5 characters.
Title must not exceed 255 characters.
description: Description must be at least 10 characters.
tags: The tags field must be an array of strings.

get.summary: Search resources by title, description, URL, category, or type
get.description: Returns resources matching the search term or all resources if no search term is provided

200.description: List of resources matching the search term or all resources if no search term is provided

post.summary: Create a new resource using tag IDs
post.description: Creates a resource. This version expects an array of tag IDs instead of tag names.

description.example: Curso completo de Laravel para principiantes.

put.description: Update an existing resource with validation

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: ID of the resource to update

description.example: A collection of best practices for Laravel development

message.example: You don't have permission to update this resource.

title: The title field is required.
Title must be at least 5 characters.
Title must not exceed 255 characters.
description: Description must be at least 10 characters.
tags: The tags field must be an array of strings.

get.description: Frequencies of tags used in resources

200.description: An object with tag names as keys and frequencies as values

get.summary: Get tag frequencies grouped by category
get.description: Frequencies of tags used in resources grouoped by category

200.description: An object with tag names as keys and frequencies as values

get.summary: Get tag IDs grouped by category
get.description: Returns the IDs of tags used in resources, grouped by resource category. This does not require a pivot table and is based on matching tag names from a JSON column.

200.description: An object with category names as keys and arrays of tag IDs as values

get.summary: List technical tests with or w/out filters
get.description: Lists available technical test with options to filter by language and any part of the title and the description

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Search by any part of the description

description.example: Solve this exam paying atention to SOLID principles

message.example: No se han encontrado tests con esos criterios
El título no debe exceder los 255 caracteres.

example: El título no debe exceder los 255 caracteres.
El lenguaje seleccionado no es válido.
El campo descripción no debe exceder los 1000 caracteres.

requestBody.description: Datos de la prueba técnica y archivo opcional

description.example: Examen sobre conceptos básicos de PHP
Examen sobre conceptos básicos de PHP
